gene.function: FUNCTION: Enhances the STK11/LKB1-induced cell growth suppression activity. Negative regulator of amino acid starvation-induced autophagy. {ECO:0000269|PubMed:17216128, ECO:0000269|PubMed:22354037}.
gene.subcellularLocation: SUBCELLULAR LOCATION: Cytoplasm {ECO:0000269|PubMed:17216128}. Note=Colocalizes in the cytoplasm with STK11/LKB1.
geneOntologyBiologicalProcess: negative regulation of cell population proliferation [GO:0008285]
